Chaining Dialogue Boxes Together

We have included a script that will return which message number is ging displayed to allow the user to display a new message. The script scr_message_number() returns which message number is being displayed. Open the collision event and string the last two messages together.

obj_npc_tiger: Collision | obj_player Event

Run the game by pressing the Play Button. This strings the first message then loops endlessly with the scond array. Next up we will ask the player a yes/no question.
